Exp_Temp_E.Title_E: Data template 7.2 - Grid point data - complex packing
Exp_Temp_E.Contents_E: NG group reference values (X1 in the decoding formula), each of which is encoded using the number of bits specified in octet 20 of data representation template 5.0. Bits set to zero shall be appended as necessary to ensure this sequence of numbers ends on

Exp_Temp_E.Title_E: Data template 7.2 - Grid point data - complex packing
Exp_Temp_E.Contents_E: NG group widths, each of which is encoded using the number of bits specified in octet 37 of data representation template 5.2. Bits set to zero shall be appended as necessary to ensure this sequence of numbers ends on an octet boundary

Exp_Temp_E.Title_E: Data template 7.2 - Grid point data - complex packing
Exp_Temp_E.Contents_E: NG scaled group lengths, each of which is encoded using the number of bits specified in octet 47 of data representation template 5.2. Bits set to zero shall be appended as necessary to ensure this sequence of numbers ends on an octet boundary

Exp_Temp_E.Title_E: Data template 7.2 - Grid point data - complex packing
Exp_Temp_E.Contents_E: Packed values (X2 in the decoding formula), where each value is a deviation from its respective group reference value

Exp_Temp_E.Title_E: Data template 7.3 - Grid point data - complex packing and spatial differencing
Exp_Temp_E.Contents_E: First value(s) of original (undifferenced) scaled data values, followed by the overall minimum of the differences. The number of values stored is 1 greater than the order of differentiation, and the field width is described at octet 49 of data representation template 5.3

Exp_Temp_E.Title_E: Data template 7.3 - Grid point data - complex packing and spatial differencing
Exp_Temp_E.Contents_E: NG group reference values (X1 in the decoding formula), each of which is encoded using the number of bits specified in octet 20 of data representation template 5.0. Bits set to zero shall be appended where necessary to ensure this sequence of numbers ends on an octet boundary
